act.title: Dialog Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.hanzi: 您好，有什么需要帮忙吗？
item.pinyin: Nín hǎo, yǒu shénme xūyào bāngmáng ma?

item.hanzi: 有小姐，我房间的电话打不通。
item.pinyin: Xiǎojiě, wǒ fánjiān de diànhuà dǎ bù tōng.

item.hanzi: 先生，您打的是内线还是外线？
item.pinyin: Xiānsheng, nín dǎ de shì nèixiàn háishì wàixiàn?

item.hanzi: 先生，拨外线请先加拨零。
item.pinyin: Xiānsheng, bō wàixiàn qǐng xiān jiā bō líng.
